questions.question: 1. What operation will be performed when S1 is set and S0 is unset:

explanations.a: At S1=0 and S0=0, the operation selected is SUM
explanations.b: At S1=0 and S0=1 the operation selected is AND.
explanations.c: At S1=1 and S0=0 the operation selected is OR.
explanations.d: At S1=1 and S0=1 the operation selected is XOR.

questions.question: 2. What operation will be performed when S1 and S0 are both set :

explanations.a: At S1=0 and S0=0, the operation selected is SUM
explanations.b: At S1=0 and S0=1 the operation selected is AND.
explanations.c: At S1=1 and S0=0 the operation selected is OR.
explanations.d: At S1=1 and S0=1 the operation selected is XOR.

questions.question: 2. What operation will be performed when S1 and S0 are both unset :

explanations.a: At S1=0 and S0=0, the operation selected is SUM
explanations.b: At S1=0 and S0=1 the operation selected is AND.
explanations.c: At S1=1 and S0=0 the operation selected is OR.
explanations.d: At S1=1 and S0=1 the operation selected is XOR.

questions.question: 4. For A=1,B=1,S1=0,S0=0 and Cin =1 values of Cout and Output are:

explanations.a: Since S1=0,S0=0 SUM operation will be selected so Cout=1 and Output=1.

questions.question: 5. For A=1,B=1,S1=1,S0=1 and Cin =1 values of Cout and Output are:

explanations.c: Since S1=1 and S0=1, XOR operation will be selected so Cout=1 and Output=0.
